title: Super Bowl X’s and O’s With Warren Sharp | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
NFL analyst Warren Sharp sits down with us on radio row to talk about Kyle Shanahan and Andy Reid trying to outsmart one another, the weaknesses and strengths on both sides of the ball for each team, what will swing this game, each team's most underrated unit, and more.
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark
Guests: Warren Sharp

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
